mapper.select: SELECT b.seq ,b.ccg_seq ,(select name from CCG a where a.seq = b.ccg_seq) as name ,b.code ,b.codename_ko ,b.codename_en ,b.useNY ,b.delNY ,b.reg_date ,b.mod_date FROM NCT.CC b LEFT JOIN CCG a on b.ccg_seq = a.seq
